name: 4chan Unspoiler
description: removes the need to hover over spoiler text in order to read it.  Spoiler text are still highlighted so you can tell when someone is using spoilers.  You can easily remove the highlight by changing the background line to "background:none !important;"
additional_info: modified from http://userstyles.org/styles/59541/4chan-unspoil-remove-spoilers cause it wasn't working for me.  I guess 4chan updated their css or something
